analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Nahetuṁ namaggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā hetu maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na hetum na magga ārammaṇam dhammam paccayā hetu magga ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nahetuṁ namaggahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā hetu maggahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na hetum na magga hetukam dhammam paccayā hetu magga hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nahetuṁ namaggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paccayā hetu maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na hetum na magga adhipatim dhammam paccayā hetu magga adhipati dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
